When the light source moves to the back left, shadows will shift forward and to the right. When the light source moves to the back right, shadows will shift forward and to the left.

The size of the shadows depends on the angle of the light source relative to the objects. If the light source moves farther away, shadows may become longer. If the light source moves closer, shadows may become shorter.

The glove is tall and irregularly shaped, so its shadow will elongate and distort as the light source moves. If the light source moves to the back left, shadow A will shift forward and to the right. If the light source moves to the back right, shadow A will shift forward and to the left.

The ring is small and flat, so its shadow will remain relatively compact but will shift directionally. If the light source moves to the back left, shadow B will shift forward and to the right. If the light source moves to the back right, shadow B will shift forward and to the left.

The bulletin board is large and flat, so its shadow will shift significantly and may elongate depending on the light's angle. If the light source moves to the back left, shadow C will shift forward and to the right. If the light source moves to the back right, shadow C will shift forward and to the left.

The cylindrical object and postcard will cast a shadow that combines their shapes. The shadow will elongate and shift directionally. If the light source moves to the back left, shadow D will shift forward and to the right. If the light source moves to the back right, shadow D will shift forward and to the left.

Shadows (A, B, C, and D) will shift forward and to the right if the light source moves to the back left. Shadows (A, B, C, and D) will shift forward and to the left if the light source moves to the back right.

Shadows may elongate or shorten depending on the distance of the light source from the objects. If the light source moves farther away, shadows will elongate. If the light source moves closer, shadows will shorten.
